name: Genius Addons For Elementor
author: xgenious

sections.description:
Genius Addon is a Elementor page builder plugins. which has a huge number addon collection along with various style. our aim is not to restrict free plugin user, you will get most of the important feature in this free version. also you will get support via our support forum .

if you have any ideas regarding this plugin or have any suggestions or found any bugs in the plugins.
please send us mail we will reach you asap and resolve the issue within 24hr.

DEMOS

CHECKOUT OUR DEMOS

ELEMENTOR ISSUE

FACING ISSUE IN ELEMENTOR PAGE BUILDER EDITOR MODE OR IS ELEMENTOR EDITOR MODE NOT WORKING ONLY LOADING ?
HERE IS ARTICLE TO RESOLVE THE ISSUE

DOCUMENTATION

CHECKOUT DOCUMENTATION

Genius Addon Plugin developed by expert team who has experience to serve over 5000+ customer with 5 star ratings

CHECKOUT OUR ENVATO PROFILE

VISIT PLUGIN WEBSITE FOR EXPLORE MORE COOL STUFF

** IMPORTANT NOTICE **
THIS PLUGIN DEPENDS ON ELEMENTOR PAGE BUILDER

AVAILABLE ADDON

  • Enjoy 1380 Line Awesome icons
  • 71+ Widgets ( 13 Widget are available for now, more cooming soon ).
  • Widgets Accordion
  • Widgets Alert Block.
  • Widgets Blockquote.
  • Widgets Button.
  • Widgets Card.
  • Widgets Contact Form 7.
  • Widgets Icon Box.
  • Widgets Info Box.
  • Widgets Image Hover.
  • Widgets Logo Slider.
  • Widgets Navigation.
  • Widgets Tabs.
  • Widgets Team Slider.
  • ( More Widgets Cooming Soon)

Credit

Line Awesome [https://icons8.com/line-awesome]
Slick Slider [https://kenwheeler.github.io/slick/]
sections.installation:
1. Go to your admin dashboard > plugins > add new
  2. search Genius Addons and click on install now then click on active.
  3. or you can download the plugin from here then upload it from “admin dashboard > plugins > add new” select plugin zip file and click install.
  4. Plugin all settings are available at “admin panel > Genius Addon”
sections.faq:
Does this Require Elementor Pro or Is it Working Smoothly With Elementor Pro

Yes, this plugin works fine with the Elementor Pro without any trouble.

Where is Plugin Settings Page Located

In your Admin Panel you will see Genius Addon menu at left side.

How long you have plan to provide update of this plugin

We are committed to deliver regular update with more features and bug fix, we love to server our customer and ready to solve their problem all the time.
